title: Tricks of the Trade: Operating a Multi-Tier Cannabis Grow
description: During this presentation, Pipp Horticulture cultivation experts Michael Williamson, director of cultivation, and Anders Peterson, director of horticulture, share best practices for operating an indoor vertical cannabis farm through all stages of plant growth; tips to improve plant health and product quality; ideas to increase efficiency, streamline workflows and reduce costs, and insights into genetics, harvesting techniques, and more.
author: Pip Horticulture

title: Revolutionizing Cannabis Cultivation With Aloe Vera
description: During this presentation, Coats Agri-Aloe CEO Ross Garrity and Texas-based VJ Farms Founder Ross Martinez provide an in-depth look at Aloe Veraâ€™s surprising role in sustainable agriculture and cannabis cultivation; an overview of the research and completed studies on agricultural Aloe Vera and its effects on plant and crop growth; how Aloe420 reduces the reliance on chemicals and has zero negative environmental impact; and how Aloe420 provides solutions to the growing veganic movement.
author: Unknown

title: Lowtemp Industries: How to Run a High Margin Solventless Extraction Lab
description: During this webinar, Cliff Haney, the Director of Marketing at Denver-based Lowtemp Industries, discusses the critical components of a high-margin solventless lab in today’s market and how to get the most out of solventless extraction. With the ever increasing popularity of live rosin, rosin cartridges, and a variety of other sought-after solventless SKUs, the need to make them as profitable as possible is critical for operators.
author: CBT Staff

title: BIOS Lighting: Unlocking the Secrets of LED Cultivation: Grower-to-Grower
description: During this webinar, the BIOS Lighting team engages in an insightful, grower-to-grower conversation about LEDs that goes deep into new and actionable strategies. Learn from real on-the-ground experiences of cultivators who've been there, done that, and thrived.
author: CBT Staff

title: AirGreen: Comparative Energy Analysis of Desiccant Technologies in Indoor Cannabis Cultivation, and How to Create a Durable, Competitive Cost Advantage
description: During this Webinar, the AirGreen team reviews the technologies and resultant energy analysis of a variety of dehumidification and climate control solutions installed at a cannabis cultivation facility, provide resultant energy analyses of each with operating cost estimates, and discuss advantages of investing in energy efficiency!
author: CBT Staff

title: Why Current THC Labeling Is Holding the Cannabis Industry Back  And What We Can Do About It
description: Flower is sold as weight percentage THC. Vape cartridges are labeled as THC/total weight of oil. But edibles manufacturers report their THC in milligrams per unit. Who can keep up with all this?
author: CBT Staff

title: Pipp Horticulture: Multi-Tier Grow Room Design: Measure Twice, Build Once
description: During this webinar, the Pipp team shares helpful insights and best practices on how to design a successful multi-tier indoor cannabis grow room. With topics ranging from pre-design considerations, to specifics on each growing system, all the way to starting up your room for the first time, you will walk away with the confidence grow vertically!
author: CBT Staff

title: Cannabis Genetics and the Supply Chain
description: In this panel discussion, breeders and growers discuss the disconnect between the retail segment and points further upstream.
author: CBT Staff

title: California Lightworks: Converting a Traditional Greenhouse to a State-of-the-Art Cannabis Facility
description: Converting a traditional greenhouse to cannabis requires extensive transformation to be successful. California Lightworks' experienced panel of experts looks at all aspects of this process and the potential costs and pitfalls.
author: CBT Staff

title: Cannabis Seeds Are Federally Legal: What Now?
description: Following the January 2022 DEA acknowledgement that cannabis seeds are federally "legal" under the 2018 Farm Bill, we attempt to clarify precisely what that means in this webinar.
author: CBT Staff

title: Vitalis: Why Outdated Perceptions Are Holding You Back: The Evolution and Applications of Ethanol, CO2, CXE, and Multi-Solvent Extraction
description: Discover how using solvents like ethanol and CO2 together can give you dramatically better results in your extraction operations. Learn why a novel application of this old idea is the key to unlocking new product innovations, simplifying your processes, and maybe even saving your business.
author: Vitalis Extraction Technology

title: Argus: Optimizing Your Cannabis Grow by Understanding Your Data
description: Learn how tracking data can help you improve your grow.
author: CBT Staff

title: Rescheduling or Descheduling: How Future Federal Decisions May Impact the Industry
description: In this webinar, a panel of expert industry stakeholders will discuss the practical consequences of this federal crossroads—and how licensed businesses can prepare for the future.

title: Current: Current Breakthroughs in LED Cannabis Research
description: This webinar features two new research trials on lighting and cannabis rooting.
author: CBT Staff

title: Agrify: From Flower to Diamonds  How to Use Technology as Your Competitive Edge in Producing More and Higher Quality Cannabis SKUs Pt. II
description: This webinar provides answers to questions raised by the audience from Agrify's earlier webinar.
author: CBT Staff

title: Grower Spotlight: Rair Cannabis Co.
description: In this interview, Ashley Hubbard shares insights into aeroponic production at Rair's Michigan facility.
author: CBT Staff

title: Agrify: From Flower to Diamonds  How to Use Technology as Your Competitive Edge in Producing More and Higher Quality Cannabis SKUs
description: This webinar dives into the technology that is required to maintain high-quality products from cultivation through extraction and post-processing.
author: CBT Staff

title: HUB International: Making the Connection Between Risk Management and Profitability: A Guide for Cannabis Operators
description: Knowing how to put in place essential risk management and insurance programs will keep you compliant and protected as you grow.
author: CBT Staff

title: Navigating California: Tips From Seasoned Operators and Experts
description: In this special 90-minute presentation, Angela Pih (StateHouse Holdings), Jocelyn Sheltraw (Headset), Claudio Miranda (Guild Extracts) and Swami Chaitanya and Nikki Lastreto (Swami Select) share tips for California plant-touching cannabis operators in today's market as it relates to price compression, retail scarcity/imbalance, resource-intensive sales and marketing support, and much more.

title: The Original Resinator: Profiting from Live Dried: The Next Wave of Craft Cannabis
description: Cannabis plants dried and cured in under 24 hours? The Original Resinator team explains how.
author: CBT Staff

title: MyAdvice: 4 Ways Digital Marketing Can Help You Grow Your Cannabis Business
description: In this webinar, Michael Antosy and Connor Morris from MyAdvice provide you with the tools and guidance you need to gain market share, retain more clients and be successful in your digital marketing efforts.
author: Cannabis Business Times staff

title: Seasoned California Operators to Provide Tips for Navigating State's Troubled Market in Free Webinar
description: The live webinar, hosted by Cannabis Business Times and Cannabis Conference, will take place July 26 at 10 a.m. PT.
author: Posted by Carlie Reese

title: FOHSE: 7 Misconceptions About LED Grow Lights
description: Because the technology is relatively new, rumors and hearsay surround LED grow lights wherever they are implemented. In this webinar, FOHSE sheds light on some common misconceptions concerning LED grow lighting.

title: PurePressure: SKU Selections: Hydrocarbon, Distillate, and Solventless
description: This presentation explores the variety of end products (SKUs) that are made using distillation, hydrocarbon, or solventless extraction.

title: IRS Audits: Mistakes to Avoid
description: In this webinar, Nick Richards, Partner & Chair of the Cannabis Law Group at Greenspoon Marder, a former IRS Attorney, will share actionable tips that will equip your business in the event of a federal audit.

title: Upwise Capital: Cannabis Business Financing on the Front Lines: Unsecured and Secured Debt Lending Options
description: In this webinar, you will get answers to your questions about financing in the cannabis industry, no matter your experience level.
author: CBT Staff

title: Emerald Harvest: Heavy Metals: The Good, The Bad and the Ugly
description: Heavy metals are everywhere even in fertilizers. But which ones are toxic, which ones are safe, and which ones are considered safe “within tolerable limits”?
author: CBT Staff

title: How to Launch a Social Consumption Lounge
description: Are you interested in launching a cannabis and/or hemp social consumption lounge—but don’t know where to start? Lounge operators from coast to coast including Sara Stewart of Green Thumb Industries, Mason Walker of The Hemp Bar and Kyle Moon of The Summit Private Lounge share their insights.
author: CBT Staff

title: Agrify: Extraction & Consumer Product Creation: Choosing the Right Supplier
description: From extraction equipment & technologies through post processing, distillation, and product creation it is extremely important that businesses choose the right supplier & partner to their business to ensure success and state-of-the-art operations.
author: CBT Staff

title: Grower Spotlight: Green Bodhi
description: In this interview, Green Bodhi owner John Bayes explains the philosophical underpinnings of his cultivation strategy. Sponsored by Fohse.

title: Supply Chain Challenges and Cannabis: A Global Outlook for 2022
description: Amid equipment shortages and shipping delays, how should cannabis businesses strategically pivot?

title: BSI: The Benefits of GMP for the Cannabis Industry
description: In this presentation, the BSI crew walks us through the rationale and practical action items involved with GMP certification in cannabis.

title: Emerald Harvest:  Plants Can't Tell the Difference: Understanding the Pros and Cons of Organic and Mineral Fertilizers
description: In this presentation, Emerald Dan provides an in-depth understanding of different types of fertilizer sources.

title: AGronomic IQ: Maximizing Your Investment with Smart HVAC Decisions
description: Geoff Brown, VP of Product & Business Development at AGronomic IQ, discusses how to make informed decisions when investing in a commercial grow HVAC system.

title: Grower Spotlight: A Vant Garden

title: Argus Controls: Precision in Your Growing Environment Is Key to a Profitable Operation

title: LED, HPS and Hybrid Lighting Systems: Calculating the True ROI

author: CBT Staff

title: Rad Source Technologies: Remediation Technology Matters
description: This webinar provided information about Rad Source’s Cannabis Decontamination Technology (420 series).

title: Quest: How to Make Your Grow Room HVAC Work for You

title: PurePressure: How To: Designing a Solventless Processing Lab
description: If you're planning to open a processing or extraction lab in the cannabis space and want to profit from top shelf solventless products, this webinar is for you.

title: BSI: GMP for Cannabis: Understanding Regulatory Requirements
description: Join our BSI cannabis experts to learn more about GMP and how to get started towards existing and future compliance requirements.

title: How to Market Your Cannabis Products for Mood, Effect and Dosage
description: "Indica" and "sativa" just don't cut it anymore. Here's how brands are describing their products to consumers.

title: Premier Tech: Mycorrhizae: Bringing Value to Your Cannabis Plants
description: this webinar will help you understand how a good mycorrhizae product can enhance the value of your plants' roots, translating into increased yields and shorter vegetative time.

title: Delta-8 THC: The Latest Research, Policy and Opportunities
description: What do you need to know about delta-8 THC right now? Find out!

title: Grower Spotlight: Aeriz
description: CBT Editorial Director Noelle Skodzinski talks with Steve Bundy, general manager for Aeriz. Sponsored by Surna.

title: HUB International: Cannabis Risk Management Essentials: What You Need to Know to Improve Your Bottom Line
description: In this webinar, the team at HUB International discusses the many risks that a cannabis business may face—and how to navigate them.

title: Kason: Advances in Drying - Cannabis Processing Meets Tomorrow's Tech
description: This webinar covers technological advances that increase throughput and quality, while reducing burn, lost byproducts and energy costs.

title: Applied DNA Sciences: How to Remove Uncertainty from Cannabis Traceability and Transparency
description: This webinar explores innovative technology solutions to ensure your raw materials and finished products can be tracked throughout your supply chain.

title: Arborjet: Improve Your Profit Margin: Performance-Driven Pest Management Solutions That Pay for Themselves
description: In this webinar, the urban-gro team discusses pest management solutions that improve your profit margin.

title: Grower Spotlight: Lume Cannabis Co.
description: A conversation exploring Lume Cannabis’ state-of-the-art cultivation operations and methods, and its science-based and data-driven decision-making model. Sponsored by Fohse.
author: CBT Staff

title: Fohse: 7.19 lbs/light, 108g/sf: How The Grove Attained the Unbelievable
description: Mike Howard, former director of cultivation at The Grove in Nevada, shares the decisions and methods that enabled his team to achieve unbelievable results.

title: BSI: Three Simple Steps Towards GMP Certification
description: Join our BSI's cannabis experts to learn more about GMP and how to get started towards existing and future compliance requirements.

title: GroAdvisor: Turnkey Extraction Facilities: Considerations and Methodologies
description: Learn how to startup your next extraction facility based on experience from the GroAdvisor team.

title: Grower Spotlight: Legion of Bloom
description: In this installment of Grower Spotlight, Editorial Director Noelle Skodzinski interviews Troy Meadows from Legion of Bloom: Sponsored by Emerald Harvest.

title: California Lightworks: Slash Lighting Costs with the New MegaDrive LED System
description: By moving the individual drivers from each LED fixture into a central power supply, both fixture and installation costs are dramatically reduced with the MegaDrive system.

title: GroAdvisor: Value-Engineering Your Cannabis Cultivation
description: Learn how to value-engineer your cannabis cultivation based on experience from the GroAdvisor team.

title: Argus Controls: The Importance of Consistency and Uniformity in the Drying Process
description: Argus Controls' panel of experts demonstrate the importance of uniformity and consistency in the drying process.

title: Valoya: Latest Developments in Research on LED for Cannabis
description: Valoya Research Director Stiina Kotiranta presents the latest breakthroughs in LED lighting applications for cannabis to help growers understand how to push their plants to produce at least a few percent more cannabinoids or flower mass.

title: PurePressure: Success with Solventless: How to Leverage Rosin to Attract Customers
description: This webinar is intended to be the intermediate-level follow up to PurePressure's previous webinar; however, both beginners and experts will find plenty of information worth tuning in for.
author: CBT Staff

title: BSI: Creating a Successful Business Framework Using ISO 9001 and HACCP & GMP
description: Experts from BSI share how ISO 9001 and HACCP & GMP allow you the opportunity to create a successful framework while ensuring product quality, safety, and customer satisfaction.

title: PurePressure: Solventless Extraction Explained: Profiting from Rosin
description: PurePressure's Director of Marketing will help give you the tools, strategies, and key information on how to capitalize on this quickly growing subsegment of the market.

title: Emerald Harvest: The Importance of Nutrients for Maximizing Return on Your Grow
description: In this webinar and panel discussion, experts from the Emerald Harvest team will discuss the role nutrients play in having a flawless grow.

title: P.L. Light Systems: The Pros and Cons of Vertical Growing
description: In this webinar, P.L. Light's sales manager explores the benefits and potential drawbacks of growing cannabis indoors in a vertical application.
author: CBT Staff

title: Essential Cannabis Businesses and COVID-19: Addressing Your Top Supply Chain and Retail Challenges
description: Produced by Cannabis Business Times and Cannabis Dispensary, a close look at how the industry is responding to the coronavirus outbreak: As cannabis businesses navigate emergent economic pressures in the U.S. and elsewhere.
author: CBT Staff

title: Fluence by OSRAM: 9 Key Parameters of Plant Production
description: As cannabis companies concentrate on consumer needs, growers are working to advance and switch production methods to generate cannabis cultivars that meet market demand.
author: CBT Staff

title: Arborjet: IPM Programs and Your Crop: Improving Quality and Uield
description: Join veteran cannabis growers and regulators as they lead a discussion around effective IPM programs and how a professionally developed, SOP-based IPM program can help ensure your success and compliance.
author: CBT Staff

title: Best Practices on Energy Efficient Cultivation: Understanding Key Terms, Maximizing Utility Incentives and Optimizing Profit
description: Join leading indoor cultivators who contributed to Resource Innovation Institute's peer-reviewed Best Practices Guides on LED Lighting and HVAC for Cannabis Cultivation.
author: CBT Staff

title: Surna: What to Expect When You're Expanding or Retrofitting
description: You may have one cannabis cultivation facility and are looking to expand and/or retrofit, or you may have already added to your portfolio of facilities either by new builds or acquisitions.
author: CBT Staff

title: Fund Your Business: Options for Raising Capital and Navigating M&A
description: In this webinar, two financial markets experts will help you understand the trends shaping capital raises and the financial perspectives you’ll need to successfully navigate these waves of corporate consolidation and integration.
author: CBT Staff

title: Genetics Advice for Cannabis Cultivation Start-Ups
description: Cannabis cultivation expert Ryan Douglas discusses cultivar selection for your business. Questions that he addresses include: How many varieties should I begin with? Should I start from clone or seed?
author: CBT Staff

title: Argus Controls: Maximizing Quality and Yields Through Plant-Centric Automated Controls
description: When making the transition to LED lighting at your cannabis cultivation facility, growers, operations and business owners must take into account all environmental controls your lighting decision will impact.
author: CBT Staff

title: Byers Scientific & Manufacturing: Cannabis Cultivation Odor Mitigation
description: In this webinar, Byers Scientific & Manufacturing presents the various aspects of an efficient and safe odor mitigation strategy for various cultivation styles and sizes.
author: CBT Staff

title: Valoya: Latest Developments in Research on LED for Cannabis
description: LED experts from Valoya discuss the latest research in this Cannabis Business Times webinar.
author: CBT Staff

title: Moving Beyond the Sativa-Indica Myth
description: This educational webinar offers new ways of thinking about the words “sativa” and “indica,” exposing scientific truths about the cannabis plant and helping business owners find new ways to teach consumers what it is they’re buying and using.
author: CBT Staff

title: How to Capitalize on Emerging Trends in the Legal U.S. Hemp Market
description: Industry observers provide important insights into the early trends and market forces shaping the newly legal U.S. hemp industry.
author: Posted by Eric Sandy

title: Fluence by OSRAM: Adjusting Your Environment  How Lighting Affects Nutrients, HVAC and IPM
description: Sean Sangster, horticulture specialist with Fluence by OSRAM, discusses the balance of environmental inputs when changing lighting.
author: Posted by Eric Sandy

title: Supporting the Cannabis Industry with Industry Best Practice and Regulatory Compliance
description: Neil Coole, Director - Food & Retail for BSI Americas, outlines ways for brand owners, retailers and manufacturers to deal with key industry challenges.
author: CBT Staff

title: When It's Time to Terminate Your Cannabis Employee, Will You Be Prepared?
description: Learn how to identify and address problems before they affect a broader corporate team, as well as how to navigate potential challenges when an employee must be let go.

title: Hiring in the 21st Century. How Your Cannabis Company Culture Changes Everything
description: Learn how to define what you value in an employee and how to attract top talent to this dynamic marketplace.
author: CBT Staff
